channel.title: CVE Feed for ALLE INFORMATION CO., LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ALLE INFORMATION CO., LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10506|2024-08-04T11:06:09.499Z -- alle%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- school%20manage%20system
item.description: The School Manage System before 2020, developed by ALLE INFORMATION CO., LTD., contains a vulnerability of Path Traversal, allowing attackers to access arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2020-10507|2024-08-04T11:06:09.272Z -- alle%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- school%20manage%20system
item.description: The School Manage System before 2020, developed by ALLE INFORMATION CO., LTD., contains a vulnerability of Unrestricted file upload (RCE) , that would allow attackers to gain access in the hosting machine.

item.title: CVE-2020-10505|2024-08-04T11:06:09.523Z -- alle%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- school%20manage%20system
item.description: The School Manage System before 2020, developed by ALLE INFORMATION CO., LTD., contains a vulnerability of SQL Injection, an attacker can use a union based injection query string to get databases schema and username/password.
